title: Stationery content typeface
content:
Does anyone have any favorite typefaces to use for stationery contact information? Serif or san serif, what are your favorites?

 [‹ Pixel fonts?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003310/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35114 "Go to previous forum topic") [Calling upon fellow Typophiles! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003310/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34798 "Go to next forum topic")
author: baskervillebold
